name: Screams of Forgotten
description:
Burned out by his stressful life, Peter travels to his family's summer cottage. Haunted by mysterious screams in his dreams, he journeys to find the source of the screams - and himself.

Game created for Games Now! Online Jam number 8 in 2023!

Tatu Heinämäki - Game design, Code
Zoe Yanko - Game design, artist
Mikko Harju - Music

Web version features some audio glitching. Download the game to ensure a glitchless experience!
